origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'IndustryInsight.get_talent_demand', 'description': 'Get the talent demand status in a specific industry.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'industry', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The industry to analyze.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'demand', 'description': 'A dictionary containing the talent demand in the industry.'}]}, {'name': 'IndustryInsight.get_company_project_success_rate', 'description': 'Get the project success rate of a specific company.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'company', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The company to analyze.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'success_rate', 'description': 'The project success rate of the company.'}]}, {'name': 'IndustryInsight.get_technological_innovations', 'description': 'Get the technological innovations of a specific company.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'company', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The company to analyze.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'innovations', 'description': 'A list of dictionaries containing the technological innovations of the company.'}]}, {'name': 'IndustryInsight.get_company_reputation', 'description': 'Get the market reputation of a specific company.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'company', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The company to analyze.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'reputation', 'description': 'The market reputation of the company.'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
获取软件开发行业的人才需求状况。接下来，查询Microsoft Corporation的项目成功率。然后，收集Microsoft Corporation的技术创新成果。最后，评估Microsoft Corporation的市场口碑。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取软件开发行业的人才需求状况。
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'industry'的值是什么?

prediction: The current value of the parameter 'industry' is not specified in the prompt. Please provide the value of the parameter 'industry' to proceed.
